Text: Thanks so much for keeping a far flung footie fan abreast of the English Game...from HRH Dominion of Canada.
Addendum: Please consider a file size of 1495Mb & Resolution of 704x400 or better 768x432. Thx 1ce more.
There is no point as the BBC only broadcast this and MOTD in SD anyway,And the recording is only 1.2 GB so it would mean making it bigger than the broadcast which is ok at best on a plasma screen.
